scripts.build: npm run webui-build && npm run cfn-build && npm run webui-package
scripts.cfn-build: npm run cfn-ensure-dist && cfn-flip -c -n -l src/cfn/template.yaml templates/template.yaml && npm run cfn-lambdas-dist && npm run cfn-copy-lambda
scripts.cfn-lambdas-dist: if [ ! -d './backend/functions/setup/' ]; then mkdir -p backend/functions/setup/; fi && if [ ! -d './backend/functions/api/' ]; then mkdir -p backend/functions/api/; fi
scripts.deploy: npm run zip && aws s3 cp ./`npm run echo-version --silent`.zip s3://$CFN_BUCKET/$npm_package_name/`npm run echo-version --silent`/$npm_package_name.zip
scripts.postinstall: npm run pyinstall && cd src/web-ui && npm i && cd ../functions/setup && npm i && cd ../api && npm i
